account_type.description: The type of account, such as `checking` or `savings`. Filterable.

business_kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC Product used to evaluate business applications

name.description: Descriptive name of the account product. Filterable.

person_kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC Product used to evaluate person applications

userdata.description: Optional arbitrary data the user can attach to the object

account_type.description: The type of account, such as `checking` or `savings`. Filterable.

business_kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC Product used to evaluate business applications

name.description: Descriptive name of the account product. Filterable.

person_kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC Product used to evaluate person applications

userdata.description: Optional arbitrary data the user can attach to the object

account_id.description: ID of the Account object that is created as a result of a successful application. Filterable.

account_number.description: Account number associated with Account object that is created as a result of a successful application

account_number_reservation_id.description: Optional ID of an Account Reservation object that allocates an account number. By default, the account number is generated when a new account is created

account_product_id.description: ID of an Account Product object that determines what kind of account is created. Filterable.

bankdata.description: Optional arbitrary data that can be attached for the bank's use

business_application_id.description: ID of the Business Application object for the business applying for the account. Only needed for business accounts

deposit_id.description: ID of the Deposit object that defines the initial funding deposit for the new account

person_applications.description: Array of objects describing persons associated with this account application, including the primary person. Always `[]` for business accounts

roles.description: List of applicant's special roles, if any. Valid roles are `owner`, `signer`, and `minor`. The `minor` role is used to indicate a person who is a beneficary but not of legal age to be a signer

primary_person_application_id.description: ID of the Person Application object representing the primary person applicant

product.description: Name of the account product (superseded by `account_product_id`)

status.description: One of: `unsubmitted`, `submitted`, `processing`, `manual_review`, `rejected`, or `approved`. Indicates the current status of the application as it is evaluated. Filterable.

data.description: Our company is engaged in the buying and selling of [...]
data.name: Acme Goods Inc

bank_id.description: ID of the bank with which the object is associated

bankdata.description: Optional arbitrary data that can be attached for the bank's use

dba.description: Alternate 'Doing Business As' name of the business, if it has one

document_ids.description: Array of Document IDs pertaining to this business

established_on.description: Date that the business was established, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD')

identification_number_type.description: Type of international identification number (max of 30 characters)

incorporation_state.description: State (max 2 characters for US, max 3 characters for other countries)

legal_structure.description: How the business is legally structured: one of `ccorp`, `corp`, `estate`, `foreign_entity`, `llc`, `llp`, `lp`, `nonprofit`, `partnership`, `scorp`, `soleprop`, `trust`, or `municipality`

mailing_address.description: Object describing the physical address of the business

postal_code.description: Postal code (5-digit or 5+4 Zip Code for U.S. addresses)

state.description: State (max 2 characters for US, max 3 characters for other countries)

street_line_1.description: First line of the address (max 35 characters)

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address (max 35 characters)

naics.description: NAICS sector code that describes the industry in which the business operates

naics_description.description: NAICS sector description matching the above NAICS sector code. If 'Other', please use an industry description prefixed with 'Other: '

org_id.description: ID of the organization with which the object is associated

parent_businesses.description: Array of business IDs pertaining to this business

ownership_percentage.description: Ownership percentage of the parent business

person_applications.description: Array of objects describing person applications associated with this business

ownership_percentage.description: The person's ownership interest in the business, represented as an integer from 0 to 100

roles.description: List of applicant's roles, if applicable. Valid roles are `signer` and `control_person`

title.description: Title of the person within the business (e.g. 'Owner', 'CEO', 'Treasurer')

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address (max 35 characters)

alloy.description: Object containing a summary of the Alloy KYC evaluation (if enabled)

alloy_full.description: Object containing the full response from Alloy (if enabled)

apply_type.description: Type of KYC waterfall. One of: `personal`, `business`. Filterable.

kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC product used to evaluate the object. Filterable.

middesk.description: Object containing a summary of the Middesk KYC evaluation (if enabled)

middesk_full.description: Object containing the full response from Middesk (if enabled)

object_id.description: ID of the object (a person application or business application) for the KYC evaluation. Filterable.

provider_full.description: Object containing the full KYC provider's response (if enabled)

provider_result.description: Object containing a summary of the KYC provider's evaluation (if enabled)

outcome.description: Outcome of the evaluation. One of: `ok`, `error`, `pending`

kyc_product_id.description: ID of the KYC product used to evaluate the object. Filterable.

object_id.description: ID of the object (a person application or business application) for the KYC evaluation. Filterable.

provider_result.description: Object containing a summary of the KYC provider's evaluation (if enabled)

apply_type.description: Type of KYC waterfall. One of: `personal`, `business`. Filterable.

provider_result.description: Object containing a summary of the KYC provider's evaluation (if enabled)

outcome.description: Outcome of the evaluation. One of: `ok`, `error`, `pending`

is_default.description: Whether this KYC product should run by default if none is specified

name.description: Name of the KYC product. Filterable.

object_type.description: The type of application upon which the KYC product can be run. One of: `person`, `business`. Filterable.

org_id.description: ID of the organization that owns the KYC product

is_default.description: Whether this KYC product should run by default if none is specified

name.description: Name of the KYC product. Filterable.

object_type.description: The type of application upon which the KYC product can be run. One of: `person`, `business`. Filterable.

org_id.description: ID of the organization that owns the KYC product

bankdata.description: Optional arbitrary data the bank can attach to the object

citizenship.description: Two letter ISO country code indicating where this person has citizenship

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the person, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD')

document_ids.description: Array of Document IDs pertaining to this person

first_name.description: First (given) name of the person (max of 36 ASCII characters)

identification_number_type.description: Type of international identification number (max of 30 characters)

last_name.description: Last name (surname) of the person (max of 40 ASCII characters)

mailing_address.description: Object representing the person's mailing address

postal_code.description: Postal code (5-digit or 5+4 Zip Code for U.S. addresses)

state.description: State (max 2 characters for US, max 3 characters for other countries)

street_line_1.description: First line of the address (max 35 characters)

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address (max 35 characters)

middle_name.description: Middle name or initial of the person, if they have one

person_id.description: ID of the person object created as a result of a successful account application

physical_address.description: Object representing the person's home address. Required for virutal ledger and some core direct integrations

postal_code.description: Postal code (5-digit or 5+4 Zip Code for U.S. addresses)

state.description: State (max 2 characters for US, max 3 characters for other countries)

street_line_1.description: First line of the address (max 35 characters)

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address (max 35 characters)

secondary_email_address.description: Optional secondary email address of the person

userdata.description: Optional arbitrary data the user can attach to the object

bankdata.description: Optional arbitrary data the bank can attach to the object

citizenship.description: Two letter ISO country code indicating where this person has citizenship

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the person, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD')

document_ids.description: Array of Document IDs pertaining to this person

first_name.description: First (given) name of the person (max of 36 ASCII characters)

identification_number_type.description: Type of international identification number (max of 30 characters)

last_name.description: Last name (surname) of the person (max of 40 ASCII characters)

mailing_address.description: Object representing the person's mailing address

postal_code.description: Postal code (5-digit or 5+4 Zip Code for U.S. addresses)

state.description: State (max 2 characters for US, max 3 characters for other countries)

street_line_1.description: First line of the address (max 35 characters)

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address (max 35 characters)

middle_name.description: Middle name or initial of the person, if they have one
